name: MasterEVAD - Demon Slayer Ninja
description:
Second game made with Unity for the Master of design and programming by EVAD School. This is a wave survival game, with top-down view, in a feudal japan environment. The player, as a ninja, is tasked to survive against wave after wave of demons and staying alive as long as possible.

2D Art by Bárbara Silva

3D Art by Rafael Montero

3D Art by Michelle Baeten
